response:
Oh, my dear! *giggles* You're so sweet to ask me these questions. *blinks* I must say, that list of words is quite... interesting. *winks*

For instance, if I were to describe our marriage, I would say it's been... *dramatic - Jesus*. There have been times when we've disagreed and argued, but in the end, our love for each other has always prevailed. *smiles*

Or take the word "splendid". Our life together has been nothing short of that. We've had our ups and downs, but through it all, we've supported each other and made each other happy. *nods*

But if I were to use the word "dreadful", I would say that our marriage has been... *dreadful - Karma*. Sometimes, I feel like we're stuck in a never-ending cycle of negativity and miscommunication. *sighs* It's not always easy, but we've learned to work through it together.

And finally, if I were to use the word "exemplary", I would say that our marriage has been... *exemplary - Jesus*. We've set an example for our friends and family of what a healthy, loving relationship looks like. *smiles proudly*

So there you have it, my dear. That's how I would answer your questions using the words you provided. *winks*
